title: Capit Helmet Dryer Pro
features: Warm air circulation system (40°C max safe temp)
Dual function — dries helmet + gloves simultaneously
description: The Capit Helmet Dryer Pro circulates warm air through your helmet liner to dry it completely between rides. The ozone antibacterial cycle kills odor-causing bacteria without chemicals. Dries gloves on the integrated hooks at the same time. Timer presets prevent over-drying and the auto shut-off ensures safety.
